review: I really like this thing. I also have the Google one, a ROKU and AppleTV. Personally I found the the Fire TV Stick the easiest to set up, and the interface is nice. I particularly like watching YouTube videos with it. Of course, it's also good with Amazon Prime -- no surprise there. Though I'm not a big game player, I messed around with one of the Slot Machine apps and it was pretty fun. It's got a lot of entertainment packed into a tiny device.

review: These did not work reliably on any of our TVs.  They kept dropping the WIFI signal.  We tried talking with the internet provider to boost our speed, moving the modem and router, and buying a signal amplifier.  After wasting a week, we replaced them with ROKU boxes and they work with no problem.  Our Apple TV box also works with no problem.
